attributes.action: Sequestrate the assets of the catholic church unless the pope expressly sanctions and supports the use of condoms by catholics by January 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On environmental and humananitarian grounds it is ludicrous that a huge population explosion occurs in the parts of the world that are least equipped to deal with it. That this increase in population flies in the face of any efforts to reduce man made CO2 release.
